rules_text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 2/1 white Sand creature token with flying.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 3/1 red Sand creature token with haste.
Whenever you cast an enchantment or artifact spell, create a 2/2 blue Sand creature token with hexproof.
Whenever a land you control enters, create a 3/3 green Sand creature token.
